other_tests.findings: Normal testes and epididymides, no change in size of the solid retroperitoneal mass.
Resection of the well-circumscribed right retroperitoneal mass (7 cm in largest dimension).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up for approximately 2 years, with no evidence of recurrence.

other_tests.findings: Polytopic B cells and T cells with no immunophenotypic abnormalities.

other_tests.procedure_name: Immunohistochemical staining for kappa and lambda immunoglobulin light chains
MRI of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI did not show any change in the size of the pulmonary nodule.
